Query.Body: MERGE [TestTargetTable1] AS TARGET USING (SELECT * FROM [TestTable1]) AS SOURCE ON (TARGET.[TestColumn1] = SOURCE.[TestColumn1]) WHEN MATCHED AND ( COALESCE(TARGET.[TestColumn1],'') <> COALESCE(SOURCE.[TestColumn1],'') ) THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.[TestColumn1] = SOURCE.[TestColumn1] WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN INSERT ([TestColumn1]) VALUES (SOURCE.[TestColumn1]);
